personal.name: Muhammad Mujtahid
personal.title: Software Engineer Portfolio
personal.description: Software Engineer specializing in MERN stack delivering full-stack solutions with clean architecture.

about.intro: I'm a Software Engineer specializing in MERN stack development. Currently pursuing BSc in Computer Science at BRAC University while working as a Junior Software Engineer at Fatmonk Studio. My journey in tech started with frontend development and has evolved into full-stack expertise.
about.details: I have hands-on experience building admin dashboards, analytics tools, e-commerce platforms, and CRM systems. I specialize in React, Next.js, Node JS, and modern web technologies with a focus on delivering high-quality solutions that meet client requirements.
about.philosophy: I believe in clean architecture, continuous learning, and delivering projects on time with high quality. Every project is an opportunity to solve real-world problems through technology.

projects.title: Monocart - E-commerce Platform
projects.description: Comprehensive e-commerce platform with user authentication, product management, and payment integration. Built with MERN stack for scalability and performance.

projects.title: SparkleMusic
projects.description: Cross-platform React Native app for music streaming and downloads from YouTube. Mobile-first entertainment platform.

projects.title: Simply Gaines
projects.description: Online marketplace platform for freelance contributors with authentication and role-based authorization system.

projects.title: Bangladesh Startup Connect 2025
projects.description: Dynamic event website with CMS functionality for BIDA's investment summit. Built with modern React architecture and state management.

projects.title: Task Master Pro
projects.description: Centralized project and team management platform with role-based permissions. Full-stack solution with modern MERN architecture.

projects.title: Fatmonk Studio Website
projects.description: Official website with custom CMS-like functionality and secure backend. Professional company website with modern design.

projects.title: Feerot
projects.description: E-commerce coupon and discount platform with real-time tracking. Modern shopping companion application.

achievements: Specialized in MERN stack delivering full-stack solutions with clean architecture
Built admin dashboards, analytics tools, e-commerce platforms, and CRM systems
Collaborated with stakeholders for requirement gathering and ongoing support
Lead frontend developer on two major client projects
Handled frontend architecture, routing, state management, and API integration
Delivered both projects on time with high quality and client satisfaction
